VoiceList.Entry: “What're you doing here? No unauthorized personnel are allowed here!!”
“Your kind don't belong here! Go on,get out!”
“Hey there! What do you think you're doing there?”
Barret “Look at all them guards runnin' around.”
“Cloud, you go on ahead and signal us when it's safe to move.”
Barret “When those guards turn around, MOVE!”
Barret “What the hell're ya doin'? Man,you gotta do it again!”
Tifa “Remember, we're here to save Aeris.”
Barret “I shoulda known it'd turn out like this…”
“If I knew it'd be like this in the first place…”
